## Subseting

## Data types

###Atomic Vectors

* There are six ways to subset an atomic vector

```{r}
x <- 10:20
#positive numbers
x[1:3]
#negative numbers
x[-c(2,1)]
#logicals - uses recyclying
x[c(T,T,F)]
#nothing
x[]
#zereo
x[0]
#names
(y <- setNames(x, letters[1:10]))
y[c("a", "b", "c")]
```
